   Phillippa Hunt 
Editorial Department   | 
Assistant Director   | 
Miscellaneous Crew 
Phillippa Hunt is known for her work on  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix  (2007),  Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban  (2004) and  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire  (2005).             
 See full bio  »
